Genres: Action, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
Reviews:
An extremely deep immersive Universe that requires hundreds of hours of guides and youtube videos to learn. On top of that training your character takes Real time not in game time so you can't get good by putting in a lot of hours, unless you spend a lot of money. That being said it's a very rewarding game at times.

Very PVP based because you can be killed everywhere. Learning how to survive more often is a skill in itself. It's hard to trust anyone in this game so if you find people to play with and build with (which i recommend), don't trust them too much. 
BEWARE! The fact everyone is behind a screen truly brings out the worst out in people, and the people in this game take their second life in EVE very very seriously. No lie some of the most toxic people i have EVER seen! This is offset by some people that give the absolute BEST help and introduction, but you're lucky to come across someone like that. 
One time i listed my 330 million ship as 33 million accidentally (which was a huge sum for a beginner like me) and after i messaged the guy he was extremely friendly and sent me the rest of the money.

I'm pretty sure it's only played by adults because of the time and money required to get to the mid-game. 
Regarding CCP games the developer, don't expect them to care, they have been trying to move away from EVE for the past 15 years, they're absolutely sick and tired of working on it, but all their other projects fail miserably.
Don't fly what you can't afford to lose, and if you can buy some starting funds or get them from a helping person. Not having to worry about losing some ships early on while you learn can make ALL the difference in your experience in this game. I would advise to not immediately try and get into Industry or Marketplace because it's one of the hardest things to get into because of the competition you have from well established manufacturers and traders.
Multiboxing is allowed and very much encouraged. EVE is pay to win all the way to the top :)

Bottom line: If you are unemployed, have disposable income, and are a sociopath (i'm joking, please stay away, we already have enough of them), this is the game for you! | multiboxing and micro transacations, as well as high sec being pirated have ruined this game | Here is the response from an elitist in regard to new players being killed and their quest item looted and sold and bricking the new players quest line;

"Sounds like a skill issue to me.

if you watch dscan, local etc. you can easily avoid other people shooting you.

If you run missions in highsec i doubt it that you get permaganked."

So if you're not into this sort of thing, don't know any of what the hell this nerd even means, and are not interested in watching/reading guides just to do quests that are non-pvp to try your best to avoid having your quest line literally bricked then this game is not for you. | The game is an abomination, it's main playerbase is built around finding the newest and inovative way to lie, cheat, screw over, and just plainly try and make your fellow players rage quit. If you're not a part of a guild you will not be able to survive. If you are part of a guild you will still not survive. If you're a new player you will definitely not survive, and you will most definitely be preyed upon continuously until you rage quit.
~This game is not about 3d spaceships going pew pew in space, its a Sociopath/Psychopath Simulator. If you're playing it for the video game and not to enhance your evil side, you're playing it wrong.
~This game is also about spreadsheets and looking at spaceships shoot at rocks for hours on end.
[i]~Legend has it Donald Trump was created in this game [/i] | My playtime ... 600 or so hours ... that's how long it takes to come to the realization that you're better off without this game. I think I'm going to return to Elite Dangerous actually, since you can flag on / off in that game and it is less a spreadsheet simulator and more a space flight simulator.

Eve has gone F2P, but has not bothered to enact the basic PvP flagging system that all other MMO games have. The kind which might attract new players, and retain players who are just sick of the nonsense. You know, adults with real lives who want to casually enjoy a game from time to time. The actual large market you'd think a company would seek out ... 

Do you enjoy feeding the trolls? If yes, play this game. Do you enjoy running from trolls? If yes, play this game. Are you a troll yourself? Then play this game, spend real life money to buy the skills and ships necessary to hunt and kill others, and enjoy.  Eve online turns one person's real life dollars into another person's frustration. It's a direct 1 to 1 relationship - the more real life dollars you spend, the more frustration you can inflict upon other people, and the more insulated you are yourself from the frustration others might inflict on you. Does that get you off? Then you've found your utopia. Link your credit card, and begin trolling other players. This developer has created a shadenfreude machine. It just costs a little bit of money. 

If you want a game to play, where you are able to enjoy playing - by engaging with the PvE elements and NPC's and missions and stories - and opt into PvP sometimes - this is not your game. 

This is 100% a PvP game, all the time and everywhere, and by installing, you are simply a target for the people who have been playing for years.

An incredibly atmospheric world with charismatic and quirky characters. The gameplay can be a bit repetitive and simplistic, but not enough to be to the detrement of the expirience. 

Several fixes are needed to run the original version of the game. The remaster mitigates this issue, though it would seem that it messes with the original art derection through modern rendering tecniques. | It's a great game, but there are a few bugs that never got fixed. One in particular, the game will crash for no reason at any time, so remember to Save Early and Save Often!!! There is also another bug where the game isn't able to locate Double H, the NPC you are adventuring with. This is a game breaking error, and if you get it, you won't be able to continue and will have to either restore to a previous save, or start over which sucks. They haven't fixed the bug in this version, or the newly released 25 anniversary edition. It's still a great game, however, if you can look past these bugs. | i wonder why, since i own this version of the game, there isn't a discount for an upgrade to the improved version of the game? this version that i purchased not that long ago won't even load anymore. instead, seems the publisher wants/expects me to pay again - at full price - for the upgrade. f that! | -геймдизайн. из-за тех.состояния играть невозможно.
~сюжет. приключение для детишек.
-графика. слайд-шоу. | Very creative + fun game! :)

Game Name: The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut
Reviews:
Este jogo é incrível, mas não é para todos, ele possui uma complexidade tática única, o que vai faz muita gente achar ele difícil quando na verdade se você usar a estratégia certa ele fica relativamente fácil.

[b]Jogue este o jogo se você:[/b]
[list]
[*] Gosta de Leitura.
[*] Gosta de RPG.
[*] Gosta de explorar.
[*] Gosta de Jogos com características táticas complexas.
[*] Gosta de jogos clássicos como os primeiros Dark Souls e Neverwinter Nights.
[*] Tem disposição para coletar e craftar itens.
[/list]

[b]Evite este jogo se:[/b]
[list]
[*] Não gosta de Leitura, (Há muita coisa para ler no jogo)
[*] Não gosta de RPG ou escolhas complexas.
[*] Não gosta de ficar perdendo tempo falando com todos npcs e entrando em todos os lugares.
[*] Gosta apenas de lutar metendo a espada nos inimigos sem frescuras como magia e alquimia.
[*] Não gosta de jogos datados ou com jogabilidade estranha.
[*] Não quer perder tempo coletando e craftando itens.
[/list]

[b]Alquimia[/b]

O uso de poções não é opcional, é OBRIGATÓRIO. Neste jogo você precisa coletar itens como plantas e partes de animais, comprar e ler formulas para poções e óleos, crafta-los e usar de acordo com o contexto, inimigo e sua estratégia. Essas informações custam caro no jogo, tanto em tempo conversando com npcs quanto em ouro para comprar as formulas. 

[b]Inimigos e Combates[/b]

A parte mais divertida para mim e mais odiada para outros. No jogo você possui uma espada de prata e uma de aço, além de 3 estilos de combate, você precisa usar a arma certa no estilo de combate certo contra o inimigo certo, e juntamente com isso combinar a magia e alquimia para explorar as fraquezas dos adversários, isso é fundamental especialmente nos chefes. 

Os pontos fracos dos monstros e chefes do jogo também não são de graça, você precisa comprar livros, e falar com npcs para descobri-los, o que você pode facilmente perder durante a progressão do game ou simplesmente ficar sem dinheiro para adquirir as informações, deixando o game mais difícil e menos rico em termos de lore. De posse da informação você precisa ficar consultado o codex do jogo para elaborar as estratégias de combate. 

As coisas não explicitas no codex, por exemplo, ele diz que o chefe do primeiro capitulo é pouco vulnerável a magia Aard, se você se deu o trabalho de aprender ou usar a magia Aard em combate sabe que ela tonteia os inimigos possibilitando que você os mate com um só golpe. 

De posse dessas duas informações você pode elaborar a estratégia de fortalecer o Aard para matar o chefe "super difícil" do capitulo 1 com apenas um golpe.  Mas cabe ao jogador chegar nesta conclusão e planejar com antecedência. Parece algo simples mas a maioria dos jogadores não o fazem pois jogam irrefletidamente. [b]The Witcher não vai te pegar pela mão. cabe a você pegar os insumos que o jogo te oferece para ter uma boa experiência[/b].

[b]História[/b]

A lore da série witcher dispensa comentários, só não posso deixar de mencionar que em diversos momentos o jogo tem coloca entre escolhas morais de fritar a cabeça. Você sempre se pega tentando entender qual a coisa certa até se dar conta que no jogo não existe isto de coisa certa, e que ninguém é inocente.

Uma coisa importante é que a história avança de forma inesperada, é normal coisas ficarem para trás na primeira jogada, sempre tenha isso em mente ao entrar em um lugar ou completar uma quest, as vezes o jogo avança e algumas quests não podem ser completadas, outras o jogador acaba deixando passar. Desta forma o jogo tem um valor alta para quem for re-jogar. | Après avoir fini le jeu en 63h, je ne peux que le recommander.

Certes, il n'est plus au goût du jour, mais n'oublions pas qu'il date de 2008 : 

-  la fluidité des mouvements n'est pas celle d'un jeu de 2019 
-  la réactivité peut parfois être légèrement ennuyante (dégainer 3 plombes après le début du combat) 

Et pour ceux/celles qui n'aiment pas faire des allers-retours pour une quête, qui n'aiment pas prendre le temps de dialoguer pour récolter un maximum d'informations, passer votre chemin ! Par ailleurs, c'est un RPG ... il faut bien s'y attendre.  

Cependant, il reste immersif et on se laisse prendre au jeu ... et puis ... toute trilogie ne commence-t-elle pas par le 1e épisode si l'on veut en comprendre l'histoire complète ?   

N'hésitez plus ...

Sans compter que 1,19€ pour 63h de jeu (soit 0.018€ / h) ... 

Bon, allez ... GO pour "The Witcher 2" !!! | The Witcher 3で初めてこのゲームタイトルを知りました。
３は本当に楽しませてもらい、物語をもっと深く知りたかったので
今回The Witcher 1の購入に踏み切りました。

安かったのもあり動いたらラッキー程度の感覚でしたが、なんとこのゲーム、windows10で動きます。
wikiにある日本語化MODもまだ生きているので驚きの連続でした。

windows10で動作するのかどうかが気がかりで、パーッと調べても答えが出てこなかったので、
このレビューが皆様の役に立つことを願っております。

ちなみにThe Witcher 2も、windows10で動作します。

 | A rough gem with an awesome story and a wonky/horrible combat system. Worthy for rpg fans and people who do not mind a bit of an old school jank | Bu incelemeyi yazmak için uzunca bir süre bekledim aslında..

Sebebine birazdan değineceğim.

[i]Abi o oyunun kombat sistemi çok kötü nasıl dayanabiliyorsun ?
Abi o oyunda boşuna vakit kaybetme 2. oyundan başlarsan hikayenin ne olduğunu anlarsın.
Abi o oyunun grafikleri çok kötü ya 5 dakika oynadıktan sonra etrafı piksel görmeye başladım.[/i]

Bunlar burada dursun..
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Yapmayın oğlum söylemeyin şöyle şeyler..

Genel anlamda internet ortamında açıkça ve rahatlıkla eleştiri yapacak bir düzeye gelmişken ayrıca bir çok şeye tek bir tıkla ulaşıp araştırma imkanınız varken kendi fikirlerinizi oluşturmayıp neden başkalarından duyduğunuz şeyleri savunuyor ve insanlara yanlış algılar hediye ediyorsunuz ?

Yapmayın..

"Gerekli laf söyleme kısmını geçtiğimi göre şimdi oyundan bahsedebiliriz"

Her şeyin başlangıcı olarak verilmese de karakteri tanımamız ve hikayeyi anlayabilmemiz için gerekli oyun olarak karşımıza çıkıyor Witcher 1.

Çok güzel bir senaryo hazırlanmış öncesi hakkında bir fikrimiz yok sonrası ise tamamen muamma ilerledikçe kendimize ve hikayeye dair ip uçları ediniyor ve bir şekilde kafamızda yaşananları şekillendirmeye başlıyoruz.

[spoiler]Oyunun en başında karşımıza çıkan çocuğun en sonunda karşımıza çıkacağını kim bilebilir ki ?[/spoiler]

Oyun sırasında çok fazla npc ile diyalog kurabiliyor ana karakterimiz adına seçim yapmamız gereken çok fazla sahne ile karşılaşıyoruz.

Yetenek ağacı ise gerçekten harika oynamak istediğiniz stile yatırım yaptıkça harika kombolar ve hızlandırmalar sunuyor.

Dövüş sistemi sanıldığının aksine birazcık refleks birazcık dikkatli oynamak mantığında ilerliyor yeterli upgrade'leri alırsanız karşınızdaki 10 kişiyi havada 5 takla atarak inanılmaz artist şekillerde kesebiliyorsunuz.

Görev mantığı ise harika tüm oyunlarında olduğu gibi hangisinin side hangisinin main quest olduğunu size veriyor ve en önemli kısmı o görevleri yapabilmek için sadece bulunduğunuz haritada değil başka haritalara gidip gelebiliyorsunuz.

"Emek veriyorsunuz"

Bu oyun için gerçekten emek veriyorsunuz eski olmasına rağmen tek bir anında bile beni sıkmayan başından saatlerce kalkmadığım bir oyun oldu Witcher benim için.

Her anında insanları tek tek tanımak hikayelerini dinlemek yeri geldiğinde sarhoş olup ağzınlarından laf almak yeri geldiğinde genel evdeki kızlara çiçek götürmek her anı ile gerçekten harika bir oyun Witcher 1.

Yaptığım seçimler sırasında gerçekten zorlandığım noktalar oldu ben olsam ne yapardım Gerald aslında ne yapar kısımlarında bazı seçim ekranlarında oturup düşünmüşlüğüm var ve her şeyin sonunda tamamen benim verdiğim kararlara göre şekillenmiş bir son çıktı karşıma.,

Oyun beni tatmin etti mi ? Fazlasıyla..
Oyundan keyif aldım mı ? İnanılmaz derece..
Peki oyunun grafikleri çok mu kötü ? Hayır kesinlikle değil
Peki oyunun combat sistemi çok mu saçma ya da çok mu zor ? Hayır aslında inanılmaz basit
Peki gerçekten hikayeyi anlamak için ilk oyunu oynamamız mı gerekiyor ? "EVET"

Neden bu kadar agresif cevaplar veriyorum ? şu yüzden..

Oyuna başladığım günün sabahında Discord da masum masum oyunu oynuyorken discordda ki arkadaşlarımızdan birisi yanıma geldi ve sırf Enis K. isimli youtuber'ın videosunu izlediği için abi o oyuna rework şart yaa gibisinden bir cümle kullandı..
Mikrofondan yumruk atabilmeyi gerçekten çok isterdim..

İlk oyunu oynamana gerek yok diğer oyunlarda hikayeyi anlayabiliyorsun diyen arkadaşlarım dostlarım..
İlk oyunda öldürüp öldürmemenin kararı sana bırakılmış karakterler diğer oyunda sırf senin yaptığın seçime göre karşına çıkabiliyorken..
3. Oyunda dahi diyaloğa gireceğimiz karakterlerin başlangıç hikayelerini ilk oyunda öğrenirken..
Firma oyunun hikayesinin temelini ilk oyunda yaptığını açıklamışken ne demek lan ilk oyunu oynama diğer oyunlarda anlaşılıyor ??

Düşünsene Matrix'i öneriyorsun arkadaşına ve diyorsun ki ilk film'i izleme adam işte Matrix oluyor..
Lan oluyor da o sırada yaşadıkları ne oluyor ? o etrafındaki insanlar nereden geliyor ? o herif Matrix olana kadar neler çekiyor ?

Oyun indirim döneminde ciklet parasına kadar düşüyorken lütfen alıp kendiniz tecrübe edin..
Yine beğenmezseniz ben hep buradayım. Oturur konuşur tartışırız.


Dikkat: " Bu incelemeyi okurken yorum ekranında bol bol devrik cümle, erken bitirilmiş diyaloglar ve açıklamalarda yumuşatılma hissedebilirsiniz. İnsanlara atar yapmamam gerektiğini kendime söyleyerek yazmış birisi olarak bu açıklamayıp da yapma gereksinimi duydum " 

Teşekkürler.
good

this game is absolutely the purest form of perfection. One of my first games that i played when i was 12 years old with my uncle -> pure nostalgia. Sad that the next series were such a disappointment. Also try the other 2 DLCs. Can't go wrong with them. They are even an upgrade from this. | Classic turn based strategy. Knowing strengths and weaknesses helps make the right decisions. Fun and challenging. Can get a little tedious, but if you like  turn based strategy, it is a fun, fun game. | 我的童年超级启蒙游戏，小学生的时候就看老爹跟关系好的叔叔玩各种英雄无敌系列，心向往之，但是玩不太明白
我记了十几年那个地狱基地的游览画面，一朝成年自己补票，还是好玩
但育碧你真是个超级大出生，我永远不会原谅你，育碧 | schönes gameplay gute story | Excelente juego y jugabilidad, muy buenos gráficos para ser un juego de mas de 10 años, muy recomendable.

[h1]Легендарна пісочниця[/h1]

Ви коли-небудь хотіли пограти щось в епоху чистого, я маю на увазі без магічних штук, середньовіччя? Якщо так, то ця гра саме те, що потрібно. Тут є досить великий відкритий світ, гра не заганяє в рамки, ви можете робити все що спаде на думку і бути будь-ким: розбійником, найманцем, торговцем, лордом або кинути виклик усім і стати володарем власного королівства, а згодом і королем усієї Кальрадії. З часом гра починає набридати, тоді на сцену виходять модифікації, це є ще одним великим плюсом. У вас є можливість перетворити гру на будь-що, від сонячного "Дикого заходу" і моторошних земель "Володаря перснів", до космічних просторів із всесвіту "Зоряних війн".

Ця гра сильно затягує, тому якщо вона вам сподобається, то з великою ймовірністю у перші дні буде награно кілька десятків годин. Серйозно, мені було важко з неї вийти, постійно в голові складав план, наприклад, ось завершу цей квест і виходжу, а в цей момент на карті з'являлися кілька лутерів і я такий "перемагаю їх і на сьогодні досить", але потім все затяглося на кшталт зроблю це, зроблю то, продам то, знищу тих, бах і замок в осаді... Дивлюся, а надворі вже ніч і треба лягати спати. Спочатку я взагалі думав зайти побігати трохи, зробити кілька знятків і вийти. І я набігав аж 130 годин за кілька тижнів.

Дивлячись на негативні рецензії, то 75% з них є просто через те, що існує M&B Warband, як на мене це не зовсім справедливо, але я розумію їх, він дійсно краще, як з технічного стану так і візуально, і так, я [b]РЕКОМЕНДУЮ[/b] починати з Warband, але не слід забувати, що оригінальний M&B це по суті його фундамент і обзивати його лохом через те, що у нього є менший брат, який набагато кращий у всьому, я не можу.

Українізатора для M&B на жаль немає, але в цій ситуації я не впевнений, чи він взагалі потрібен, як я писав вище, краще починати з Warband, Українізатор для якого є.

[h1]7 полонених королів з 10[/h1] | Mount & Blade – це унікальна серія, яка втілює мрію кожного гравця про свободу у відкритому середньовічному світі. Розроблена турецькою студією TaleWorlds Entertainment, гра стала справжнім подарунком для любителів стратегій, ролевих ігор та епічних битв. Незважаючи на відсутність глянцю великих ААА-проєктів, Mount & Blade захоплює своєю глибиною та неповторним шармом.

Свобода вибору
Однією з найбільших переваг Mount & Blade є повна свобода дій. Ви починаєте як невідомий мандрівник і можете стати ким завгодно: найманцем, торговцем, лордом чи навіть королем власного королівства. Гравець має змогу самостійно вирішувати, як писати свою історію в світі Калрадії – фентезійного середньовічного континенту, наповненого політичними інтригами, війнами та нескінченними можливостями.

Бойова система
Mount & Blade відома своєю реалістичною та динамічною бойовою системою. Битви відбуваються в реальному часі, і від вашої майстерності залежить результат кожного поєдинку. Можливість брати участь у масштабних битвах, керувати загоном чи навіть стати героєм, який змінить хід війни, дарує незабутні враження. Ви відчуєте всю вагу меча, точність стріл і потужність кавалерійської атаки.

Стратегічні елементи
Крім бойових аспектів, Mount & Blade пропонує широкий спектр стратегічних можливостей. Ви можете формувати власну армію, керувати ресурсами, будувати економічні ланцюжки та укладати дипломатичні угоди. Захоплення міст і замків, боротьба за політичний вплив та управління підданими додають глибини ігровому процесу.

Атмосфера та світ
Калрадія – це світ, сповнений життя, історій і конфліктів. Різні фракції, культури та політичні амбіції створюють динамічне середовище, де кожна дія гравця впливає на подальший розвиток подій. Атмосфера середньовіччя відчувається у всьому: від музичного супроводу до деталей одягу та архітектури.

Особливості серії
Mount & Blade: Warband – вершина класичної серії, яка додала мультиплеєр і розширила можливості для створення власного королівства.
Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord – довгоочікуване продовження, яке зберегло дух оригіналу, але вивело графіку, механіку та масштабність гри на новий рівень.
Графіка та технічні аспекти
Хоча графіка Mount & Blade не є найсильнішою стороною серії, це з лишком компенсується глибоким геймплеєм і багатством можливостей. Своєрідна естетика додає шарму та допомагає зосередитися на головному – на грі.

Модифікації – душа Mount & Blade
Окремої уваги заслуговують моди. Спільнота фанатів створила величезну кількість модифікацій, які додають нові фракції, епохи та навіть змінюють сеттинг гри. Хочете опинитися у Середзем’ї з "Володаря перснів" чи перенестися у світ вікінгів? Завдяки модам це можливо.

Загальне враження
Mount & Blade – це гра, яка дає вам більше, ніж ви очікуєте. Вона не хапає зірок із неба у графіці чи постановці, але її глибина, свобода та реалістичність роблять її однією з найкращих у своєму жанрі. Це проєкт для тих, хто любить виклики, стратегії та хоче творити власну історію у світі середньовіччя.

Оцінка: 9/10
Mount & Blade – це гра для душі, яка вимагає часу, але нагороджує незабутніми враженнями. | ilk m&b.

also, this game is not afraid to punish you with some hefty recoil, which is really nice and adds a solid challenge. i wouldn't call the gunplay "realistic" but it is close enough that it feels pretty damn good. the devs managed to make you feel weak at times, but also strong and badass as hell at other points. shooting the patriarch's limbs off with dual handcannons never gets old.

A Solid 9/10 and absolute classic. Have loved it since it first came out and now later in life. I just wish one issue technically/strategically/in terms of game design was fixed. If this was fixed the game would be perfect 10/10. 

As you build up your army organically against the King its population value can sometimes too drastically lower Rebel Sentiment to initiate the Revolution. So you could have towns that are in the high 90% of being pro Independence and being ready to go yet the Overall Score is stuck in the low 30%. This is completely lopsided and after I did everything right with the right buildings, founding fathers etc. 

In essence it's too much of a trade-off between growing your population/army along with maintaining the popularity needed to initiate the revolution. This SHOULD NOT BE A TRADE OFF! This catch 22 problem means you can't win the game as reasonably due to Strategy/Design Error. The best way to fix this is to remove Military Units from the calculation of Rebel Sentiment entirely. 

I have made comments on this issue in forms, on STEAM, along with others. Yet it doesn't seem to be fixed anytime soon. Sad given such a great game.

Jos olisin käyttänyt kaiken tähän peliin käytetyn ajan gradun tekoon niin se olisi ollut jo ajat sitten valmis. Civilization IV:ssä herahtaa vesi kielelle ja dopamiinia erittyy ainakin pelin alku- ja keskivaiheilla. Loppuvaiheessa on jo monesti olo, että peli on voitettu, joten voi himmailla. Loistava peli kaiken kaikkiaan ja mielestäni Civilization-sarjan huipentuma ja viimeinen mohikaani, jossa ei vielä rangaistu kaupunkien perustamisesta ja maailman valloittamisesta samaan tapaan kuin näissä uusissa nurkkakuntaisissa kaupunkivaltioräpellyksissä. While this game has great nostagia and is super fun, the controls are so bad that I can<t in good conscience tell modern gamers to buy it. | Crash-tastic! 

My memory of this game, of playing it off a CD, is that you could read an entire comic book waiting for a new level to load. Unfortunately that's the part of the game that has been preserved here. Bugs galore, including having actions edge off screen and characters 'dropping' through buildings making them unmovable or un-engagable. What was fun about this game originally was the campy concept and bright colors. It doesn't look right now. The bright colors and comic book dashes and dots with this early animation style doesn't scream page-turning immersive world. It's like a cheap, superficial game you'd get on a cellphone. 

The missions can be painfully simplistic and there isn't a sense of team building or world building. Your reward is largely your own imagination as you earn enough to unlock 'sets' of abilities or skills. If you're someone who wants the nostalgia either from the original release or from the really, really old comics, this might scratch the itch. If you have even slightly high standards informed by modern games, you'll be disappointed. 

The idea that something this simplistic came out in the same era as the Halo games or even the early Civilization games is a little shocking to contemplate. The people who designed it loved Patriot City and some of the 1980's kind of super villain tropes. They had fun with this, clearly, I just don't think it aged well and given the depth of both missions and conceptual design of other early 2000's games I remain shocked it was ever reviewed and ranked so highly. 

I guess get it if it's on sale or you're really, really curious about what people did when they weren't playing Quake back in the day.

I think it is a really niche game. I recommend it because it is objectively a nice game if you are into that type, but I bet 90% of gamers will not have a good time playing it.

Game Name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion® Game of the Year Edition
Reviews:
If you're new to this title:
Oblivion isn't a game that you play. Oblivion is a game that you conquer.
Yes, the graphics and mechanics haven't aged well. Yes, the dialogue is often hilariously unhinged. And yes, the game is ripe with bugs and quest breaking sequences that induce a paranoid amount of saving. But its' defects can also be broken in your favor. THAT realization is when the game grips you:
What can you get away with? What cheese tactics, what exploits, or what innocuous and obscure thing (like picking up and dropping a paintbrush from your inventory... this is not a joke) can you leverage to your adventure— and how far can you leverage it? And there's so much to be adventured: every nook and cranny or every dungeon, achieve and ace every quest, grind every attribute and skill to max, collect every unique item, and then, after a 100+ hours... lament that it's over.

Which brings us to those who are returning to this title:
You know as well as I that this game has near to no replay value. Everything Oblivion has to offer can be experienced in a single playthrough, and the narrative has little to no variation (nor any substantial dialogue or narrative choices for those hopping for more RP in their RPG like the CRPGs that predated it).

It can be a hell of a ride, but with a story you can only fully revel in once, as a fresh player.
Otherwise you're only left to recall the insatiable desire to see and do everything until the memory of your previous experience is restored, which quickly dulls the experience.
However, on a personal note, I will add: that one thing I recalled was that this was one of the few games that truly made me feel as though I were fighting an endless army of demons; running, jumping, and cutting through one Oblivion gate after another...
And I felt it still, even years after its' initial release.
May it make you feel such heartiness as well. | its a nightmare to make this game stable. but its SUPER modable so you can alter it in any way you want like a sandbox. i recommend your learn the modding tools they are easy and you can make a lot of fun stuff for roleplay etc. and despite the goofiness it can be an engaging story, deep lore and great questlines.
if you're unconfortable with the modding and fixing and all that nonsese, and you own skyrim special edition i suggest you buy it just so you can get skyblivion this year (LATE 2025).
its a remake of oblivion made by modders in the skyrim se engine (with unique updated assets/worldmap/EVERYTHING) and the full game will be required to isntall it | This is the best Elder Scrolls game to date, and the best value for your money on Steam in the category of first-person action RPGs. It is a sandbox environment that starts you out on the island that the main city is in, in the center of the map. Each city has a different architectural theme, and a house that you can purchase if you have enough gold and meet the other criteria. The interface is far better than both its predecessor, Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind, and its successor, Elder Scrolls IV: Skyrim. The character design is also superior to both, as they did away with character classes in Skyrim. The game world is more beautiful if you don't follow the main quest past delivering the item to the monk at the piory, because if you close the first oblivion gate then oblivion gates start popping up all over the map. There is plenty to explore without the main quest. | I should have played this ages ago. Much to my regret.
Sure, it's "old" now- but this version functions very well. 
The forerunner for many games we enjoy today. | Loved this elder scrolls, great main story, cool ending, the world is pretty okay but aged exceptionally well for a 2006 release. NPC's are sometimes pretty odd but certainly an iteration on their continuous polishing & improvement of their approach in the RPG genre, which is portrayed in Skyrim. A recommended playthrough, especially for the main story!

Massively dated but still more fun than the modern sw battlefront games. | A shining example of an old game that blows a good chunk of modern games out of the water in terms of content variety & prioritizing fun for the player. | El mejor juego sobre Star Wars que alguna vez existió jamás, con mucho contenido y horas de diversión aseguradas, sobre todo en acción instantánea, además de resaltar la emocionante pero a la vez intrigante campaña sobre la legión 501 y su evolución a través del fin de las Guerras Clon hasta bien adentrada la Guerra Civil Galáctica.

Un clásico de clásicos, simplemente. | Listen, the graphics now are pretty meh, but the gameplay is still top tier | Best Star Wars shooter game. played since childhood on console and now that I have a good PC, modding has brought countless brand new experiences into the game I love

-: umelá inteligencia, pusté lokácie, krátky SP, chabý arzenál, Windows LIVE

+: grafika, efekty, audio, MP, atmosféra, bojový oblek, menu, video sekvencie, zábava, niektoré epické lokácie, rýchla akcia, cena, intro, zoskok, vozidlá

Verdikt: Section 8 vcelku slušnou FPS hrou s originálnymi prvkami. Singleplayer je krátky a slúži skôr ako tréning pre multiplayer. Po technickej stránke je na tom hra veľmi dobre. Grafika a efekty sú na slušnej úrovni. Vrámci singleplayeru potešia aj príbehové videá, ktoré príjemne spestrujú atmosféru hry. Jadrom hry je multiplayer, ktorý sa vydaril a je naozaj zábavný. Mapy sú rozľahlé, miestami síce pusté, ale celkovo pôsobia epicky. Negatívom hry sú problémy s Windows LIVE. Zakomponovať do hier niečo tak otravné, nedorobené a pokazené je iba na príťaž. V hre by mohlo byť aj viacej zbraní. Ich aktuálny počet ako základ postačuje, ale pre lepšie možnosti hrania by sa ich množstvo mohlo kľudne aj zdvojnásobiť. Section 8 je určená pre fanúšikov FPS so sci-fi tématikou, ktorá nemôže naplno konkurovať gigantom tohto žánru, ale svojich hráčov si určite dokáže získať.

The dev is out of business, all the servers are down, and the game is soon to be crippled by the imminent shutdown of GFWL.

Stay away! | This review was written on January 23, 2011.

The single player is a 3 hour long generic campain, and the multiplayer is long dead and there is no one to play with. Big waste of money even with a big sale. Some promising ideas but Section 8 ends up being way too generic with a dead multiplayer. 

NOT recommended.

PROS

- Dropping from the skies instead of respawning is cool
- Somewhat good cinematics
- All things considered, multiplayer is good and has its own flavor.

CONS

- Campaign is 3-4 hours short, story is shallow, the whole single player aspect is unsatisfying.
- Below average level design. It feels too big most of the time, and even if the scenary looks good (the sky above and the smoke on the horizon), things that are immediately close to you like guns, armors, buildings, and such are generic.
- DEAD multiplayer. As I write this, there are exactly 5 multiplayer servers online, 4 of which are empty. 
- Contrary to the cinematics, the art ingame is mostly bland.

REVIEW

There is not much to say about Section 8. 

The campaign is short and shallow, only 3-4 hours long. When I beat up a mission and seen the credits roll, I was amazed as I thought i was barely 1/4th of the way and just finishing the introduction phase waiting for a greater, more interesting plot to surface. Very disapointed on that aspect. 

If the multiplayer was still alive, I'd give this game a 7 instead of a 5. It has a single mode that is similar to domination (control areas), but it has a nice innovation that is the dynamic objectives. Escorting convoys, fetching intel, or either protection or killing VIPs at random keeps things interesting. But unfortunately it has been a while since the multiplayer fell from the skies and cracked its skull on the hard, cold concrete. Playing with 32 people is fun, but right now there is barely a handful of servers online, most of them empty, and the ones populated have barely a few players on and mostly bots.

CONCLUSION

Because of the dead multiplayer, right now there is no reason to buy this game anymore... unless you find it for 5$ or so, and even then it would still be a questionable purchase.

I'd skip this game entirely. | На первый взгляд Section 8 очень хорошо сложена и имеет задатки. Заглавная музыкальная тема от маэстро Джейсона Грейвса так и вообще – внушает надежду. Но вот с масштабом разработчики просчитались – в Section 8 слишком мало новых идей и разнообразия, чтобы претендовать на место в сердцах игрового сообщества. Быть может, в будущем TimeGate учтет свои ошибки, а пока – имеем то, что имеем. | Actually surprisingly awesome!  The jet pack mechanic is not quite as good as Tribes but apart from that it does actually feel like a Tribes 3. The battles also feel very “Battlefield”-like which definitely goes in its favour.

Particularly love the 'burn-in' mechanic which always manages to make a respawn feel awesome. The sub-mission mechanic also really livens up the traditional area control maps.  The building mechanic also works well. Certainly enough innovative ideas here to make this a must have. 

Only downsides are that unfortunately the community is quite small with only a few servers. Can’t really blame this on the game though, it deserves a lot attention than it gets. The vehicles could be more interesting too, but they are functional enough. Furthermore inventory management certainly could learn a lot from Tribes

This game is brilliant at allowing you pull of cinematic manoeuvres that leave you feeling awesome.

Для меня risen в первую очередь - это платок, которым утирают слезы появившееся от воспоминаний по старой доброй готике. Я бы не осилил игру, если бы не проходил ту самую готическую трилогию, от которой у меня по сей день витают воспоминания. Рекомендую игру для любителей классической готики. | steam keeps asking if i recommend this game and frankly, i’m not sure. i had genuine fun with it for about 50 hours, but i kind of suffered through the last 10. why? because at its core, it’s a solid Piranha Bytes game meaning the hardcore beginning and the lengthy first act (easily half the game) are the best parts. you know, all that classic routine: learning the world’s rules, figuring out who the baddest baddie is, and choosing a faction to side with. running errands for some sketchy hombres. exploring caves and shores, only to get smashed on the head by a random ostrich (or whatever the hell those things are). getting bullied by the bullies at first and bullying them later. mugging and getting mugged. waking up NPCs in the middle of the night just to pester them with dumb questions. waiting until nightfall just to use the smithy because, during the day, those bulky blacksmith bastards hog it nonstop, leaving you waiting for a turn that will never come. sound familiar? that’s because this game is basically [i]Gothic[/i], just in a slightly different setting with much better graphics. plus, Kai Rosenkranz composed the ambient music for this one too, and his tunes really hit close to home.

BUT, the first time you try to take on some lizardmen, you’ll realize the combat is janky as hell. all those action points you invested in sword fighting? they don’t mean dreck because those bastards block [i]everything[/i]. every fight becomes a battle of wills: me vs. the will to keep enduring this suffering. and then, when you’ve finished all the open world stuff and only the plot missions remain, you’ll remember: the main story is the weakest part of the game. it’s just uninteresting and painfully boring. again. yep guys, this is truly a Piranha Bytes game. also, i was surprised to see in the credits that Andy Serkis, Lena Headey and Johnathan Rhys-Davies contributed voice work. why? because the acting [i]felt[/i] kind of uninspired. or maybe the writing was so generic and dull that i ended up skipping most of the dialogue and missed everything. who knows?

to wrap this up: after all i do recommend playing this game because Piranha Bytes knows how to create an engaging, tightly packed open world. but beware, it’s an old game, and it has its fair share of jank. actually, quite a lot of jank. but hey, let’s admit it, that’s part of its charm. | Игра просто разрыв очка! Game Name: Borderlands Game of the Year Enhanced
Reviews:
Terrible remaster that adds few QoL fixes and nothing else.

Pros:

- You automatically collect the ammo
- There's an in-game map
- You can use modern resolutions

Cons: 

- No bugs were fixed:  Enemies still fall through the map, pathfinding 100 % broken for AI etc.
- New bugs added: Moxxi Underdome music disappears whenever it feels like it, never addressed. 
- You STILL need to edit .ini file to remove mouse acceleration. Some QoL changes that are possible to change from. ini, crash the game
- There's a memory leak that was never fixed, no matter how much community tried to raise the issue
- Randy Pitchford is still in charge
- Borderlands 4, despite all the half-assed stuff in the remaster is advertised in the main menu like a mobile game pop-up and is the only thing that 100 % works in this case. 

Gunplay is decent but don't ever buy this at full price. I paid 3 euros and while it was and is for a nostalgic factor, it's the only price the remaster deserves. | Borderlands Game of the Year Enhanced Edition,

I would have never discovered this incredible series if not through reccomendation, and I can say with complete certainty that I would have missed out on an incredible adventure. The Dragon Age series is wonderful dark fantasy adventure full of heart, danger, and tense comraderies, and Origins kicks it all off with an amazing premise.

The Fifth Blight has fallen upon Thedas. An incursion of darkspawn monsters, led by a powerful archdemon, is on the horizon. It is up to the Grey Wardens, sworn defenders against the Blights, to save the realm. It is up to You, Warden, to save your country alongside questionable companions, performing poilitical favours, and exploring the world from outside your sheltered origin. All of this, whilst grappling with the question; Is Ferelden even worth saving?

As the name of the game suggest; this a tale of origins. Most specifically; yours, as you have 6 different origin stories to choose from (Noble, Clansperson, Urchin, Commoner, Scholar, Outlander), each intrinsically based on your chosen race and class. The Dragon Age world is one fall of cruel stygmatisation, with no exceptions; not even you, player, are immune to discriminations and priveleges of this world, and that adds wonderfully dreadful realism. As you explore the world, and discover the rules of this unfair world, you feel it because you placed into it, in an incredibly real way.

And that's just the character creation, and the origin stories that you can play through. Once you've experienced the first two chapters of this fantastical tragedy, you develop a clear picture of what this world is like, and how hard it is going to be to help it into the light, all whilst darkness creeps in from the Kocari Wilds, and the Blighted monsters march to consume your home.

You will meet incredible companions, each from their own walks of life. With customs, attitudes and struggles that are all so unique you will grow to love them all, but only agree with a few. The approval system, an iconic staple of Bioware's adventure games, makes every choice of words and action, alter the perception your troops have of you individually. Some decision can even cause a drastic split in your group dynamic that shakes up your experience. What's more the dialogue that takes place behind the Warden's back is always a lovely treat.

In terms of character, story, world, and the "choices matter" genre, Dragon Age: Origins is an absolutely masterclass of writing. However, for me the biggest flaw of the game is the combat. The bones of it are absolutely brilliant; the tactical camera, the tactic loadout system, and the pause-to-command features are innovative and wonderfully executed. But what makes it all fall flat for me is how sluggish the combat itself is. The game grounds every aspect, apart from the fantasy, in realism. Drawing and loosing arrows takes time, swinging around swords and hammers takes time, accurate and forcefully stabbing someone in the back takes time, and that time feels so drawn out, and tiresome due to this realism. Even the speed of characters in combat is realistically, and painfully, slowed down, meaning it takes my warriors and rogues far too long to make it from one opponent to the next. What's more, because of this realism, being limited to 4 characters per combat (one of which HAS to be your character), the opponent will almost always have the action economy advantage.

Whilst this is my one major gripe about the game, and it is a hefty part of a GAME to complain about. It does not ruin the experience for me. I love building my team up to face this tough (tiringly slow) battles. I love clearing the numerous dungeons for loot, secrets, and the mysteries each quest presents. I love battling, or talking, or bartering my way to these climatic moments, at least two of which in each region, that will shape the fate of not only, the country but the entire world.

After all, this is Dragon Age: Origins. It is only the beginning of an entire history that you, the player - over the course of FOUR amazing games - will shape. | Потеряло актуальность с выпуском Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition. | The best DA | Un jeu qu'il est bien. | 10/10

Muchos mods, pero con algunos mods es dificil pq tienes q jugar con una sola mano
 | The game also comes with a DLC, which includes the following items:

1. A Toxic Community: Mistakes are rarely forgiven. Unless you’re playing with friends, be prepared to face harsh criticism, often from younger players. The game’s multiplayer is largely populated by school-aged players who don’t hold back.


2. Disruptive Adults: It’s not just the kids causing chaos—some adults blast music through their microphones, assuming everyone else shares their taste. Spoiler: they don’t.


3. Frequent AFKs: Teamwork can fall apart when a teammate goes inactive, whether they’re brewing tea, taking a smoke break, or simply wandering off mid-game. And yes, it often happens right after you’ve generously used your first aid kit on them.


4. Team Abandonment: Lone wolves running off to the far corners of the map, only to be overwhelmed by infected, are a common sight. They’re quick to flood the chat with colorful language before rage-quitting the game.


5. Difficulty Disputes: Some players join games on "Expert" difficulty only to demand a downgrade. If their request is denied, they might sabotage the team before leaving the server entirely.


6. Vote Kicks: Occasionally, you’ll encounter players who inexplicably start a vote to kick you from the game. When you ask why? Crickets.



The Verdict: Despite the chaotic community, Left 4 Dead 2 remains a phenomenal experience. The graphics are a significant step up from the first game, the mechanics feel more polished, and there’s a greater variety of weapons and infected to enjoy. However, surviving the online experience without a calming remedy might be just as challenging as surviving the zombie apocalypse itself. | Крутая игра для игры с друзьями (которые в это не играют)! Есть редкие достижения, куча пушек и толпа зомби, которая будет медленно наступать на пятки и их съедать. В общем, весело, рекомендую. | [h1]写了800字的推荐文，手欠点了一下"否"全没了。不说了血压高了,头晕。[/h1]总之就是《关于一个萌新GMOD玩久了无聊直接去玩L4D1多人因太菜反复被僵尸虐而被队友抛弃伤心自责卸载游戏过半年好奇进L4D2知道玩单人熟悉官图及玩法过程中发现了能打MOD结果一发不可收拾地搜各种进阶攻略教程提升自己游戏体验和能力努力不坑队友可仍然很菜但是很感谢带萌新入坑的朋友们以及创意工坊的大佬们给这游戏第二次生命的事》 | Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2), released by Valve in 2009, is the gold standard for cooperative zombie shooters. Featuring intense survival gameplay, smart AI, and an incredible atmosphere, L4D2 delivers an unmatched multiplayer experience. With its fast-paced action, diverse weapons, and unpredictable enemy encounters, this game remains one of the most thrilling and replayable co-op shooters ever made.

Gameplay – Pure, Adrenaline-Fueled Action
L4D2 is all about co-op survival. You and three teammates must fight through hordes of the undead, navigating through various maps and completing objectives to reach safety. The key to survival? Teamwork, strategy, and adaptability.

The gunplay is tight and satisfying, with a wide selection of weapons including assault rifles, shotguns, SMGs, sniper rifles, and melee weapons like axes, katanas, and even frying pans! Every encounter feels dynamic, thanks to the AI Director, which adjusts the difficulty based on your team’s performance, ensuring no two playthroughs are ever the same.

Special Infected – Enemies That Keep You on Edge
Beyond the standard zombie horde, L4D2 introduces Special Infected that force players to work together:

Tank – A massive brute that can throw debris and crush survivors.
Witch – A terrifying enemy that, if startled, can instantly incapacitate a survivor.
Smoker – Uses a long tongue to drag players away from their team.
Hunter – A fast, agile infected that pounces on survivors and pins them down.
Boomer – Explodes in a shower of bile, attracting a massive horde.
Charger – Charges through groups, slamming a survivor into the ground.
Spitter – Creates pools of acid that deal heavy damage.
Each Special Infected forces different team strategies, making communication and positioning absolutely crucial.

Campaigns & Maps – A Horror Movie Experience
L4D2 features multiple campaigns, each set in diverse, apocalyptic locations across the southern U.S.:

Dead Center – A chaotic mall escape reminiscent of classic zombie films.
The Parish – A tense race across New Orleans to reach an evacuation zone.
Swamp Fever – A creepy, foggy swamp filled with infected dangers.
Hard Rain – A unique campaign featuring a devastating hurricane that changes the environment.
Dark Carnival – A fan-favorite, featuring a deadly amusement park with a thrilling rollercoaster finale.
Each campaign feels like a mini zombie movie, packed with cinematic set pieces, interactive environments, and intense finales.

Multiplayer & Game Modes – Endless Replayability
L4D2 offers several game modes that keep the action fresh:

Campaign Mode – Classic co-op survival through story-driven levels.
Versus Mode – One team plays as survivors, while the other controls the Special Infected.
Survival Mode – See how long you can last against endless waves of zombies.
Scavenge Mode – A competitive mode where teams race to collect fuel cans while being hunted.
Mutation Mode – Weekly game modifiers that add fun twists to gameplay.
Thanks to modding support and the Steam Workshop, the community has also created hundreds of custom maps, weapons, and campaigns, making L4D2’s replayability practically infinite.

Graphics & Sound – Immersive and Timeless
Even years after release, L4D2’s atmospheric lighting, detailed environments, and gruesome effects hold up well. Zombies react realistically to gunfire, and the sound design is masterful, with eerie background noises, terrifying growls from Special Infected, and intense musical cues that heighten the suspense.

The voice acting and character interactions bring the survivors to life, making them memorable and adding humor to the chaos.

Why Left 4 Dead 2 is a Must-Play
L4D2 is the perfect blend of action, horror, and co-op gameplay. Whether you’re playing with friends or AI teammates, the intense combat, unpredictable enemy encounters, and endless replayability make every match a thrilling adventure.

🔹 Final Rating: 10/10
Left 4 Dead 2 is a masterpiece of cooperative gaming. If you love zombies, action, and teamwork, this is an absolute must-play that still delivers endless fun and excitement after more than a decade.

First, yes, you absolutely SHOULD play this game. If you're reading this here right now then that means you're obviously curious about it. I'll save you the mulling over it being old and eurojank. This game is absolutely worth your time, it is a PHENOMENAL experience and it still plays very well after all those years (even on vanilla). I bought this game because my friend recommended it to me in high school (a full decade ago lol) and it exceeded every expectation I had for it.

Now, for a warning. This has to do with the end of the game but I will try my best to explain this with little/no spoilers for anything plot related, because I really, REALLY wish I had know this before I played the game:

the last two/three levels of this game are an awful experience. They are unfairly difficult in a way that is not possible to predict and prepare for without knowing ahead of time what you are getting into. I won't go into the context of what's happening or where it is happening, but suffice to say you're fighting an ASSLOAD of enemies that can easily one shot you in a setting that will kill you just by standing in it to long. It is INSANELY EASY TO SOFTLOCK yourself into not being able to complete the game (happened to me TWICE meaning I had to redo about 8 hours of the game for BS reasons). Here's what you need to avoid that:

- you need a powerful weapon with a LOT of ammo. These enemies will gut you as soon as they turn their attention on you; the best option is to take them out BEFORE they have the opportunity to fight back. That means precision head-shots with a quality weapon (mid-tier assault rifles aint gonna cut it, I'm afraid).
- You need VERY good armor. Like I said before, the enemies hit harder than a dump truck here. If you want to stand even the most remote of chances, you need some strong armor. More importantly though you need armor (and artifacts as well) that have good stats against radiation, which brings us to the last suggestion....
- you need a metric FUCKTON of anti-rad kits and medkits. This is non-negotiable. The radiation in the final area of the game is SO ridiculously extreme that it is, by far, your biggest enemy, and by far the single biggest culprit in the game for softlocking people out of completing it. Even after killing/escaping every hostile enemy in the final area, the radiation will continue to get worse and worse and if you do NOT have the right equipment to fight it literally all the way up to the final cutscene, there is a very real risk you will soft lock yourself literally FEET AWAY FROM TRIGGERING THE END. It is BEYOND frustrating. Make sure, for god's sake, that you take the radiation threat seriously at the end of the game. Up to that point, radiation has been at worst a moderate threat in game, which luls you into a false sense of security and might make you not collect enough anti-rad artifacts and equipment throughout. This is a MASSIVE MISTAKE to make. You absolutely need them for the final area, you will NOT SURVIVE if you do not prepare for this. 

There, that's all you need to know to keep yourself from soft-locking yourself out of the end of the game. So long as you heed my advice and keep these points in mind for the end of the game, you should be golden. It's such a shame that the game ends on such a bullshit and unfair note like that, because evreything leading up to it is truly remarkable. But nevertheless, even with the terrible last few hours of the game, the vast majority of the game is incredible and definitely worth your time. Pick it up whenever you can, and good hunting, Stalker. | Thanks to its story and setting, I really got drawn into the game. After completing it I couldn't wait but go to play the next parts. I finished the whole game two times and would do that again as Shadow of Chernobyl is still playabe even in 2025. It's definitely worth trying out. | Ось вже пройшов сталкер: Тінь Чорнобиля, і що можу сказати. Це дійсно класна та цікава гра, з крутою атмосферою та сюжетом. Мені сподобалося проходити цю частини, і тепер буду наступні. Взяв відразу комплект сталкера по знижці і ні каплі не шкодую. Дуже добре витрачений час.
Всім рекомендую. | The shit still hits strong after all those years since I played it for the first time in 2007. I still think it has the strongest story among the trilogy.

В начале третьего тысячелетия эта игра была главным конкурентом и самым качественным клоном [b]"Diablo 2"[/b]. Со всеми вытекающими плюсами и минусами.

Очень длинная, невероятно разнообразная, ну и, конечно же, связанная с мифами Древней Греции, которые лично меня не оставили равнодушным. | Когда разговор подходит к описанию интерфейса Titan Quest, хочется просто пожать плечами и спросить — вы видели WoW? Тогда вы и так все знаете. Ну, Diablo-то вы точно видели? Тоже очень похоже - это настоящий наследник Diablo в мифологическом сеттинге — тот самый редкий случай, когда результат оправдывает все ожидания.

Казалось бы, простая идея: килограммы злобного «мяса», груда оружия и заклинаний, широкий ассортимент навыков, километры лугов, полей и темниц да аркадный ритм, не отягощенный глубоким сюжетом, задушевными беседами, хитрыми пазлами и всем прочим, что приходит на ум при слове «RPG». Сто тысяч кликов мышью — и золотой ключик ваш.

На сегодня (конец 2013 года) это, без преувеличения, одна из самых красивых CRPG. С первых и до последних минут над землями Эллады, Египта и Поднебесной парит жар-птица с крыльями из долларовых бумажек. Арт-команда отработала зарплату сполна. Отличные модели и текстуры, плавная анимация, яркие, насыщенные мелочами пейзажи, великолепное освещение и честные тени делают картинку осязаемой.

Эта игра эталон качества, от которого должны отталкиваться будущие претенденты на звание Идеального Клона. Падать ниже — смерти подобно. | An oldie but goodie.  Trust me, if you are an RPG fan, get this game.  The graphics still hold up to this day and RPG elements are amazing and addicting.  

Classic RPG in my opinion | Very fun game. I'm very impressed that every monster in the game actually DROPS WHAT IT'S HOLDING! PLus it's nice to fight things other than the demons of hell. I just wish I played this game back in its prime! | A Powerful Skill Tree makes this game Great. Also has a very good selection of weapons, armory and relics that you can combine. The Storm and Spirit Mastery are the best. A good hack and slash loot feast. Good stuff.

In my humble opinion, this is the greatest ARPG ever created, enhanced by the fantastic mod support that the community has used to the fullest. The class system is amazing, allowing you to combine two out of nine mastery trees to make your own unique class with an incredible amount of customization.  You have the fully offensive, close-quarter mastery Warfare, which revolves around duel weidling weapons and becoming a whirlwind of AoE and single target damage, at the cost of defence. Ranged masteries like Hunting which allows you to deal huge amounts of damage from a distance, and debuff your enemies defences. Magic masteries such as Spirit, which allows you to drain the life from your enemies! And 6 other unique and exiting masteries.

The world is vibrant and beautiful, starting in Greece, them moving to Egypt, then China, and with the DLC, even into the domain of Hades himself! The quests while perhaps a little generic, are very fun and easy to follow, and often give satisfying rewards along with a nice chunk of EXP and Gold! Not to mention the amazing loot you will find along your journey.

All in all it is a wonderful game, one of my all time favourites, I highly reccomend checking it out. And if you enjoy it, keep an eye on Grim Dawn, a game being developed by many of the same people that made Titan Quest, it promises to be an equaly enchanting ARPG set in the Victorian times! | 鉴于目前这款游戏正在打折并且我也非常喜欢这款游戏,特意花了些时间写这了篇玩家测评
友情提示:
1.游戏购买的话强烈建议买Titan Quest Gold这个大包,商店地址:
http://store.steampowered.com/sub/402/
包含了泰坦之旅原版及其资料片不朽王座(相比原版增加了第九种专精梦幻之境,超大的第五幕冥界地图及对应的剧情,新增神器栏位及大量装备等等)
2.黄金版默认优先级最高的语言是德语,如果客户端使用简体中文或者繁体中文的话,将游戏语言改成英文或者将客户端语言切成英语
3.推荐资料:泰坦百科JOYGAO,在百度泰坦之旅吧右侧的公共网盘有下载,有地图/技能/装备说明等资料,帮助上手

因为不朽王座需要在原版的基础上运行,所以将原版的测评加到这里避免发两个内容类似的测评,下面是正式内容:
泰坦之旅是一款个人认为非常优秀的ARPG,拥有广阔的地图，史诗般的冒险旅程，细致的场景，独特的音乐，以及丰富的搭配。
1.游戏世界及场景:游戏世界包括了五个章节地图,(I)希腊(II)埃及(III)东方(IV)奥林匹斯山(V)冥界。前三章节基本取材于现实世界,以欧洲的地中海地区+非洲与亚洲为基础构建,有很多著名的场景例如雅典城、斯芬克斯像、空中花园、长城、长安城等等，而后两章则是以神话背景为主,(IV)奥林匹斯山作为原版的BOSS战地图只有一个场景,(V)冥界则是资料片新增内容,比之前的章节地图都要大且复杂一些,同时难度也远比之前要高。场景有缺点但更多的是优点:因为对于火焰和闪电特效的优化不足，部分场景存在着卡顿的问题（主要在第三章和第五章后面的少数场景）,不过还好大多数情况是流畅的并且有补丁可以一定程度改善。值得一提的是即使很多地方玩家不一定注意到，制作组还是将游戏的场景细节处理的非常不错,例如各个场景中摆放的工艺品及壁画装饰等等.
2.剧情:泰坦之旅的主线剧情和很多奇幻风格的游戏一样是一路成长斩妖除魔,看似平淡却不平凡.主角最开始只是名普通的冒险者,随着冒险的展开,击败了一个个强大的敌人，人们眼中可怕无比的怪物甚至高不可攀的神最终也被击败,游戏的名字Titan Quest我觉得起的非常不错，主角完成了他自己的泰坦之旅,最终成为一名被人歌颂事迹的英雄,玩家也目睹这一切,其中的艰辛与成就感相信可以在游戏过程中慢慢体会出。主线剧情有三个难度，普通、史诗与传奇，想要完全通关一个角色必须先后通关这三个难度。支线部分则轻松许多,多是帮助路过的城镇的局民解决一些问题或者是探索一些地方的宝藏,奖励也很丰厚可以多做一些.
3.人物/怪物:制作组将很多历史与神话故事里面的人物加入到游戏当中作为npc,其中一些还设计了与之相关的任务.可惜的是很多人物只是借用了一个名字且只有一些人物设计了单独的模型。而相比之下怪物种类设计就多样并且很多有鲜明的地域性,例如米诺斯迷宫中的公牛怪,尼罗河附近手持矛或法杖的鳄鱼怪,长安城皇宫中的兵马俑.
4.音乐及音效:泰坦之旅的音效相对来说中规中矩，我感觉不错的包括一些被动技能触发、锤类武器打击怪物时的音效，剩下的就先不说了。主要说下音乐。游戏针对不同场景设计了与场景十分搭配的音乐,例如山洞/迷宫/雪山,不同章节（希腊/埃及/东方/冥界）的背景音乐也有着明显的风格差异,我觉得比较好听且说得上名字的音乐是初期在希腊的When God Falls(游戏中更轻柔些且没有歌词)([url=http://www.xiami.com/song/1770541533]试听[/url])与后期领主那里的Rock Of Mages([url=http://yun.baidu.com/s/1dDfmVBF]试听[/url])。BOSS战的时候也跟据章节及BOSS种类设计了多种背景音乐,营造出一种紧张的氛围。
5.技能与装备:游戏共有九个专精,包括偏战系的战斗/防御/狩猎专精,偏法系的风暴/大地/死灵专精与偏辅助的梦幻/自然/盗贼专精。人物总共可以选择两个专精(分别在2级与8级),专精选择好后即有独特职业名(共36种双专精职业与9种单专精职业)。技能方面采用了专精条+技能树的设计,升级与任务获得的技能点数将用于专精点数及技能点数上,如果想要学习一个技能就必须学会其技能数的基础技能(如果有的话)并达到相应的专精条高度,这就需要玩家在属性(专精条加成)与技能威力(技能等级)之间进行权衡,保证尽量在整个游戏过程中有足够的输出及安全性。!!不过要注意的是!!，因为有了专精条占用了大量的技能点数，前期的输出技能可能比较单调甚至没有以甚至只有武器普通攻击,可能会带来较少的乐趣.游戏的装备非常多样,配合技能有非常多搭配。怪物的技能也非常多样性，包括技能的特效，伤害类型都进行了设计，造就出了很多杀手级的怪物，一不注意就有可能被这些拥有强力技能的怪物杀死返回重生泉，BOSS的技能相当强力，在传奇难度下有的BOSS甚至有将角色满血秒杀的能力。从寻宝游戏的角度来看,泰坦之旅的装备比较多样性,独特装备较多,且掉落几率相对较高(百分之几至千分之几的居多),而且多亏了游戏"怪物装备什么掉落什么"的设定,可以通过和周围同种怪物的外观区别来迅速识别出想要的装备,寻宝的效率大大提高,同时又有一些珍惜的词缀与装备底材搭配,出现了一些"浮云装备"来供寻宝者们挑战收集.是一款非常不错的寻宝类型的游戏.
6.MOD:优秀的MOD可以延续游戏的生命,为游戏注入新的活力,泰坦之旅的MOD方面做的还算不错,个人推荐一个很不错的MOD叫SoulVizier,这个MOD在原来游戏的基础上增加了大量的新装备与部分技能,平衡了一些专精,因为装备与人物技能的思路与之前并无太大差异,所以在对于游戏有了一定的基础后可以尝试这个MOD.

强烈推荐

4月4日补充:
感谢TQ的新东家Nordic Games,本月泰坦之旅迎来了它的新版本,许多bug得到了修复,游戏平衡性及一些细节也得到了改动.加上上个月开启的联机测试(开启教程见游戏的新闻页面,不出意外的话不久之后就会正式全面正式开启),泰坦之旅这款游戏再次焕发出了活力,相信以后也会有更多的精彩内容,对这款游戏有兴趣的希望不要错过.

9月17日补充:
十周年版
http://store.steampowered.com/app/475150 | Titan Quest, and its worthy expansion Immortal Throne is, imo, part of the holy trinity in ARPG's along side Diablo and Dungeon Siege. Titan Quests theme is unique, and the gameplay is so faithful to the principles that made diablo so great.
There is a massive, diverse world covered in several acts. In combination with tons of loot in the suspected qualities to keep the flow of the game intact. On top of that, the game also follows the model of increased difficulty (normal, epic, legendary), remeniscent of Diablo's normal, nightmare and hell. Each difficulty features harder monsters and better loot.

If at one point, you would get tired of the original campaign, you can try some of the fantastic mods available, especially Lilith: Battle for Jalavin (a totally newly created world which will take you up to 20 hours to complete). This mod in combination with other well known TQ mods such as Masteries mod (skill overhaul mod), gives more than enough incentive to go through the whole experience all over again with a fresh new slate.

All in all, if you are a fan of ARPG's it is a genuine crime not to have this masterpiece. The majority of the now-closed TQ studio (Iron Lore) are in the process of making a spiritual succesor named Grim Dawn (by Crate Entertainement). Given their history with TQ, this is a title to keep in mind as well and currently available through early acces on steam.

Closing advice: go spend money on this, preferably as soon as possible, you will not regret it. | Пожалуй одна из лучших Hack'n'Slash RPG. Которая может сравниться с мастодонтом жанра Diablo и даже в чём-то её обыграть. Например :
* Большой простор для создания собственного класса. Воин-Маг, Лучник-Убийца, Маг со щитом - пожалуйста, создавайте и отыгрывайте свой класс. Сколько я много в эту игру играл, а все комбинации так и не испробовал. 
* Мир более проработан, локации не представляют собой рандомно созданные пещеры или леса, а созданные вручную места, так, что бродить по ним не приедается даже после n-ого по счёту прохождения.
* Удачная адаптация Древнегреческих, Египетских и Китайских мифов в которых мы принимаем непосредственное участие. Раньше до того как не опробовал игру, я и не мог себе представить, что Hack'n'Slash + Мифы Древней Греции могут быть чем-то толковым, но я ошибался.
* Титаническое количество лута, как обычного так и уникального (у которого существует несколько градаций), причем на первой сложности все предметы вы не сможете найти, с новой сложностью становятся доступными для нахождения новые более мощные предметы. 

Короче говоря мне не стыдно поставить в один ряд такие две игры как Titan Quest и Diablo так, как каждая из них обладает своими неоспоримыми достоинствами. | Titan Quest is almost ten years old, but it's still one the best action RPGs out there.  

Pros:
Great skill system offers a TON of replayability
Good in-game mythos based on real life mythology
Excellent variety of enemies to fight
Well-balanced loot drops (not too much, not too little)
Some uber-bosses only in appear in harder difficulties giving you incentive to play through again

Cons:
No map randomization
No instanced loot in multiplayer
Game stutters once in a while even on modern computers

If you like action RPGs grab it next time it's on sale, or hell, grab it now! It's worth every cent.

Dawn of War: Soulstorm remains a timeless gem in the RTS genre, and its enduring appeal owes much to several key factors. The graphics, while from an earlier era, have aged remarkably well. The detailed unit designs and atmospheric battlefields still capture the gritty, war-torn essence of the 40k universe, immersing players in the chaos of the far future.

The game’s story and factions stay true to the Warhammer 40k lore, delivering a narrative that resonates deeply with fans. Each faction feels authentic, from the relentless march of the Necrons to the righteous fury of the Sisters of Battle, ensuring that the gameplay aligns perfectly with the dark, gothic atmosphere of the universe.

Perhaps the most remarkable aspect of Soulstorm is its vibrant modding community. Over the years, dedicated fans have kept the game alive and thriving, introducing new factions, campaigns, and quality-of-life improvements. Mods like the Ultimate Apocalypse and Unification expansions breathe new life into the game, offering a fresh experience even for long-time players.

For fans of 40k and strategy games, Dawn of War: Soulstorm remains an essential classic, as compelling today as it was at launch. | The greatest warhammer RTS game of all time

p.s. the best thing about this game is the mods
For the Emperor!! | The classic 40K RTS. Hasn't been topped since. It is an old game so expect bugs, but there's extensive mods and patches available. | Всего лишь за 30 минут Некроны со своими огромными болтами полностью доминировали над моей слабой эльфийской жопой.
10/10 сыграю ещё раз. | The best strategy game I've ever seen, and the best game in the entire Warhammer 40k franchise

At first, when looking at the steam page and reading the game contents, I expected a rather different product, something that would be similar to "Planetside 2", a type of game that has the global war aesthetics. Although the game turned out completely different to my imagination, its a decent shooter that involves a wide diversity in equipment, allowing the gameplay to be more dynamic.

I'd say its "Call of Duty" with "Battlefield" inspirations, as the addition of vehicles are awesome, making the game stand out. The gameplay actually feels great as it delivers the total war aspect, with shooting, fighting and vehicle combat all around the player, especially when rockets whizz over the head, exploding somewhere in the background or under your feet. These characteristics portray the authentic feel, which involves the player into the fight, especially when you drive off the enemy forces and take the objectives one by one, feeling less resistance with each step. While the story was not anything spectacular, I was more interested in the missions, as various battle scenarios, where the NPCs are surprisingly well set, as they do not always target you no matter what (as in other shooter games), but also pay attention to other threats, such as your teammates and friendly vehicles.

Now, the game lacks, in my opinion, in gunplay, because the weapons seem very inaccurate with high spray. Assuming that the assault rifle is your most used weapon in almost all the missions, shooting it felt very unsatisfying, as it would already lose its efficiency already in mid range (especially if you're trying to shoot the enemy's unguarded body parts, whose behind the cover). Speaking of enemies, they are fairly buffed (or perhaps the weapons' damage is low), as you need to decently spray the enemies with bullets in order to kill them. I found the MG (also the sniper rifle) to be the most efficient, as it two-shots everyone and can easily tear up sentries, but unfortunately its available only by the end of the game. The legendary red barrels that explode upon shooting, are also lacking in their function, as explosion damage seems to have a very small area of impact, which is the same with any explosive-related weaponry.

Nevertheless, I liked the game, despite it not meeting my expectations (my expectations, my problems XD) and having troubles in key areas, the overall gameplay feel is there and I can definitely recommend to try the game, if you like shooters.

This port is horrific, and there's no way to play any of the DLCs on PC.

There was supposed to be a patch made by former community manager IdolNinja, who sadly passed away from cancer. Despite many promises to him personally that the patch would be completed, it was never completed, Volition closed down, and now, the game is just as unstable and broken as in 2009. 

Gearbox should be ashamed for continuing to sell this, for all of the problems the ports of the later games have, they are actually playable. This game genuinely crashes so often it stretches the meaning of "playable", and just to make it stable, you need multiple separate fan patches.

One of which is made by IdolNinja too, from before he was even hired by Volition. The fact that they didn't even bother to integrate his bugfix mod into the game's download is an actual insult to his memory. Somehow, this version of the game manages to be a "fuck you" to the legacy of someone who was by all accounts a decent guy.

Do not buy this. the 360 version in Xenia is a better experience. The KBM controls in this version suck anyways, it's not exactly a downgrade to play compared to this port. And you can actually play the DLC mission packs.

Gearbox is actively pissing on the legacy of a developer who died of illness working on the final patch for this game. | Saints Row 2 is the best in the series and I find it to be a amazing game. However the PC port barely runs at all and using the Gentlemen Of The Row mod pack only extends the game from not crashing for 10 to 30 minutes. This game is a 10/10 but I'd recommend playing this game on a PS3 or Xbox since backwards compatibility | O jogo em si é incrível, o melhor dos Saints Row na minha opinião, história boa, personagens maneiros, humor e seriedade equilibrados perfeitamente.

Mas os bugs, crashs e travamentos do jogo deixam ele uma experiência bem ruim de se jogar no pc, somente com mods vc pode ter uma experiência mais estável do jogo, mesmo assim não é perfeito e ainda vai levar muito tempo para o jogo rodar liso e sem defeitos no pc com a ajuda de mods, porque a Volition(desenvolvedora) abandonou o jogo. | certified classic.
if you're experiencing fps drops or crashes try to install a Juiced Patch. it fixed a lot of issues with game for me | while the game itself is fantastic, this port is HORRIDif you can emulate xbox360, run that version instead its somehow more stable

Game Name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Anniversary Edition
Reviews:
At first I didn't like the gameplay being a StarCraft verteran.But I warmed up to it .The atmosphere is where it's at as this game seems to capture the essence of 40K.I would recommend this game to anyone who likes squad based hero type RTS games with no focus on base building or resource management. | I play the singleplayer campaign at least once a year. Together with the mod Ultimate Exterminatus, which I highly recommend, the campaign becomes a great experience (on top of what it already was) with great replayability. | Dawn of War 2 jest grą strategiczną rozgrywaną w czasie rzeczywistym w jednym z najpopularniejszych uniwersów przyszłości – gotyckim świecie Warhammera 40000, w którym krwawą walkę toczą między sobą przedstawiciele kilkunastu armii.

Tym razem w trybie single player gracz może poprowadzić do boju oddziały świetnie wyszkolonych Space Marines.

W odróżnieniu od poprzedniej części mamy zdecydowanie większy wpływ na kolejność zajmowanych terytoriów.

Nasze oddziały przed każdą bitwą znajdują się bowiem na statku kosmicznym orbitującym wokół planety, o którą toczy się walka.

Każda misja zwieńczona jest potyczką z tzw. bossem, czyli przeciwnikiem, który jest bardziej odporny na obrażenia i dysponuje potężniejszymi atakami niż większość wrogów.

Wraz z postępami w grze, wzrasta poziom doświadczenia Kosmicznych Marines, dzięki czemu z zadania na zadanie coraz lepiej radzą sobie w boju.

W Dawn of War 2 dowodzimy oddziałami najczęściej składającymi się tylko z kilku żołnierzy, wobec czego autorzy chcąc, aby gracz łatwiej się z nimi identyfikował postanowili je spersonalizować.

Tak więc każdy z nich posiada własną nazwę oraz lidera wymienionego nie tylko z pełnionej funkcji, ale także z imienia i nazwiska. | Great game. One of the WH40k and general best ones. Alows you to make your own pace and tactics. Easy to lern mechanics and lot of options for fine tuning your squads. | New warhammer fan since space marine 2 so this is part of of my crusade into the content and lore with the games (and books and models and painting). And yeah  this is a great warhammer game.  The ambiance is there, the faction, the action, the quotes. Epic Warhammer 40 k! (and I 'm no heritic to say otherwise)

Super fun destruction in game with a thin story and pretty empty world but theres enough here to get you to the end I like this game better than red faction 2 and what came after. | è un classico ed ha una distruttibilità degli ambienti che fa invidia a giochi moderni, se ti piace il retro game (anche se questo non è così tanto retro game) è un esperienza interessante | 内容は平凡ですが、売りの「壊し」は楽しかったです。 | W Red Faction Guerrilla Steam Edition gracz sam decyduje, kogo, kiedy, gdzie i jak zaatakować.

Wykorzystuj taktykę guerilli, improwizowaną broń i zmodyfikowane pojazdy, aby prowadzić ataki na cele EDF.

Prowadź akcje w swoim własnym stylu, wykonuj misje w dowolnej kolejności lub angażuj się w destrukcyjne działania, aby osłabić kontrolę EDF nad Marsem.

Wykorzystuj zniszczenie na swoją taktyczną korzyść, zastawiając pułapki lub tworząc łańcuchowe eksplozje, aby atakować wrogie twierdze i trwale zmieniać środowisko gry.

Przetoruj sobie drogę przez nieustannie zmieniający się krajobraz, improwizując taktykę walki – mieszaj style gry, pojazdy, broń i materiały wybuchowe, aby pokonać EDF.

Eksploruj rozległe, nieprzyjazne tereny Marsa, od odludnego górniczego posterunku Parker po lśniącą stolicę EDF – Eos.

Przemierzaj całkowicie zniszczalne, otwarte środowiska pełne sił EDF, walczących członków Ruchu Czerwonej Frakcji i udręczonych osadników uwięzionych w ogniu walki.

Nie ma miejsca na chowanie się, gdy wystawisz swoje umiejętności guerilli na próbę w różnych, pełnych destrukcji trybach wieloosobowych. | Потеряло актуальность с выходом Red Faction Guerrilla Re-Mars-tered.

I finally did it it took what felt like eternity to beat this it was probably the most miserable time I have had playing a video game in a while decent game for what it is but the some of the design choices in this game are defiantly questionable and the map destruction is underutilized and I would not recommend this over quake series or half life | this is good game amazing grapich but amazing fps! | Score: 3/5* (sounds like I would have lowered it a point if I had played to completion)

Gameplay, gunplay, controls, saving, sound effects, voice acting, and enemy AI are all good.
Graphics and story-line/setting are average, but visual aesthetics have aged pretty well. No major technical issues or game-breaking bugs, just a few environmental hit-boxes being larger than their model suggests.

I quit this game twice: once when it was new and once when it was outdated (2025) with little-to-no nostalgia. It stops being fun a few hours in, and I didn't even get to the part that most negative reviews described as the bad part/half of the game.

First few hours were fun though, before grinding to a halt about halfway through the story (2 hours in, assuming the later chapters are about the same length as the earlier chapters). You get vague instructions for a set of 5 objectives in close proximity to one another. Used up most of my resources with multiple reloaded saves because it wasn't clear what objective I had missed and/or how I was supposed to complete one or more objectives. No pun intended: this section and lack of clear direction/instructions destroyed my immersion/engagement with the story/setting and lead me to use (the small number of) console commands to tackle the key marketed feature of the game.

I began limit testing the permanent environmental destruction.
It was a very interesting and new technological innovation for Red Faction's release, but it's just disappointing decades later. It is rarely used for engaging exploration or clever ways to solve (or get around) puzzles. Many of the materials are indestructible, including the rock "wall" at the edges (including the top) of a level's environment: I think each level is a large cube of rock/stone with the level "dug out" by the level designers and then stuff like walls/floors/ceilings/pipes/buildings/furniture/NPCs are placed within the dug out spaces.

I digress. The game simply isn't designed to let you use its featured, brand-spanking-new mechanic in interesting ways. There are clear markers/signs (visual or vocally described by a VA) that you are supposed to explore somewhere or open a new pathway by blowing up a very specific part of the environment, and are really wasting your time trying  explosives on any unmarked places, even with ammo cheats enabled. | Je suis vraiment énervé. Enervé parce que ce jeu m'a fait miroiter un FPS beaucoup plus intéressant qu'il ne l'est réellement. J'ai passé toute la campagne à le supplier de mieux utiliser son potentiel. 


Le Geo-Mod qui a fait la fierté du jeu ? Plutôt bien exploité dans les premières maps, puis anecdotique et quasiment pas gratifiant par la suite
Le système d'escalade de certaines surfaces ? Présent à un seul moment alors que ça aurait pu vraiment donner des niveaux uniques.
Un arsenal varié ? Pas vraiment d'intérêt à l'expérimenter, et en plus on vous le remet à zéro plusieurs fois.
Des phases d'infiltration pour amener de la variété ? Ridicules et pas du tout fun.
Un scénario aux bases intéressantes ? Dommage, vous aurez une histoire de révolution finalement assez solitaire. Niveau personnages, vous avez le méchant le plus cliché possible, des alliés qui vous gueuleront des ordres de manières particulièrement insupportables et des PNJ qui ne servent quasiment qu'à vous bloquer le chemin.


Red Faction est également un jeu buggé, même si vous avez le fanpatch qui a pignon sur rue. J'ai été ainsi softlock plusieurs fois au point de relancer des maps via la console du jeu.


La cerise sur le gâteau, c'est le dernier tiers du jeu que je trouve raté, entre :


-  l'arrivée d'un certain type d'ennemi qui s'avère posséder une puissance de feu absurdement élevée (dans un jeu qui, jusque là, n'était clairement pas exigeant pour un FPS de cette époque) . A vous la joie des fameuses sauvegardes de la mort, celles qui nous voient à l'article de la mort juste avant d'affronter des mobs puissants qui respawnent à l'infini !
-le level design qui vous laisse en plan avec des objectifs flous et du backtracking
-un manque de pêche général
-des bugs !

Je salue quand même l'efficacité du jeu en tant que FPS défouloir solo, les phases en véhicules réussies quoique courtes et une belle variété dans les environnements.


Cela dit, Red Faction a très clairement loupé son rendez-vous avec l'histoire du FPS des années 2000.


 | Stará klasika z roku 2001. Není co víc napsat prostě si to zahraj. I po těch letech to prostě zabaví líp než některé nové rádoby AAA tituly.
